title: Day 28 PDL
body:
I need to be more patient in my spiritual growth of getting to know God and on the building of my castle. I really like this girl but I know that I'm not ready for a relationship yet because there's so much to learn about God and myself. As good as it seems right now, it is not wise to disrupt my growth with God with my desires now. I need to build my castle first before I can welcome a queen. I just need to be reminded that I want to love the next person the way that God loves me and be the best boyfriend and husband I can be to them and lead her to Jesus too. I want to make sure that I have Jesus in the center of my life and it takes time with all my opinions and defenses, but at the end of it, I'll be like Him.
I think I've learnt enough of the worldly ways and I'm good at being a worldly human but I still have so much to learn spiritually and also in terms of wisdom to make the right decisions and keeping myself away from sin. We as young ppl always want to be the first to achieve this and that and we want to marry young asap but I need to get to know the heart of God and be able to be a reflection of His heart then I'm ready

title: Day 27 PDL
body: Yall are my spiritual partners ❤️ I know I'm not perfect and I have so many flaws but I want to grow to be the best version of myself everyday so even if I hate admit that I have pride in my work or that I am having some feelings for a girl, I still would want to share what's truly affecting me because it is only when I'm truly hornet and transparent, that's when I can truly change on the real root.

title: Hurt Devo
body:
1. Don’t worry about anything.
2. Pray about everything.
3. Tell God what you need.
4. Thank Him for all He has done.

title: Uncomfortable - Blake Young
body:
David chose comfort over warfare
- fatigue from past battles
- pride of past accomplishments
- discouragement of past losses
Getting uncomfortable is the passionate and persistent pursuit of God's presence and purpose, privately and publicly
Craving comfort creates covert cancer, corrupting character completely canceling Christ's covering.
Craving comfort cancels covering
Divine discomfort deepens devotion, destroys demonic discouragement, demolishes dangerous distractions, defending destiny
Divine discomfort defends destiny
Psalms 51: 12-13
1. Make an active, daily pursuit of God your personal priority
2. Make faith-filled community and discipleship the corporate priority
3. Step out in faith and obedience on what God has told you to do.
4. Share the love of God to all who God puts in your heart

title: The posture of a disciple - Mark Varughese
body:
1. Simplicity
2. Vulnerability
3. Expectancy
Without expectancy, you lose access to the blessings of God
Pride
Prestige
Position
Disappointment
Familiarity
These stops you from being simple, vulnerable and expectant
